title: Pregnant Lydia Bright cries as she feels her first kick in heartwarming video

Lydia Bright is expecting her first child and has documented the emotional moment her baby kicked for the first time.

She is currently on holiday in Greece with best pal Lucy Mecklenburgh , who is also pregnant.

Lucy shared an adorable video of the two as they laid in bed together before she turned the camera to Lydia who started crying.

The fiancee of Coronation Streets' Ryan Thomas gushed: "So Lyd hasn't felt a kick yet, I have, and she got a little bit jealous and worried."

The brunette beauty continued: "And she just felt her first kick and she's all upset. Aww Lyd - it's so lovely isn't it?"

(Image: Instagram)

Lydia, in tears and too emotional to speak, had one hand over her mouth and the other holding her growing bump, while Lucy laughed and enjoyed the sweet moment with her friend.

This isn't the first trip they've been on together since announcing their pregnancies.

The former Towie girls took their bumps out to lunch in London last month and both looked positively blooming.

(Image: Instagram)

Lucy, 28, was casual in a pair of blue jeans and a smart blue blazer, which she wore with a Wonder Woman t-shirt that clung to her growing belly.

She dressed down the look with a pair of white trainers and teamed it with a studded black bag on her shoulder.

Lydia, 29, sported a black maxi dress with a sheer lace panel just below the knee.

(Image: Instagram)

The Essex girl kept comfy in a pair of slip-on loafers with a cosy fur trim.

She sported a floppy biege hat that had a black band and a matching black pendant on a gold chain.

Lydia also wheeled along a small suitcase and a white shopping bag.

Both ladies kept low-key in sunglasses as they enjoyed their relaxed meet-up in the capital.

(Image: Instagram)

They've known each other since their TOWIE days, with both of them appearing in the very first season.

Lucy is expecting her first baby with fiance Ryan and Lydia is expecting with ex boyfriend Lee Cronin.
description: Lydia Bright cried when she felt her baby kick for the first time as she laid next to best pal Lucy Mecklenburgh
